attributes.action: Lower the increase to UK visas that will come into place
attributes.background: I would like the government to lower the increase in the visa fees that will be coming into place. I work in education myself and myself and a lot of others do not agree with this decision. Why should immigrants be punished from being able to move to the uk to be with their loved ones.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641140
